title: Drug release system based on a composite polycaprolactone nanofiber membrane with dual functionality of shape memory effect and antibacterial ability
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,26884-26895
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05618C, Paper

Le Thi Le, Hue Thi Nguyen, Ha Thi Thu Bui, Huy Quang Tran, Thuy Thi Thu Nguyen
The shape memory performance of the electrospun polycaprolactone composite nanofiber membrane was improved, tuning its drug release behavior and antibacterial activity.
